title: A Special's Love
description: When a loved one passes away the family is left with sorrow. the spirit of the person often sees this pain and refuses to crossover. I, as your SPECIAL you can help the family and the spirit with a conversation and a reassuring glance.as a SPECIAL, you know all your life that there is one person who is truly ment to be with you. Your soul mate. What happens when you go to help a family with their loss and the spirtit your helping leads you to your Soul Mate, and so much more
author: Jennifer Blaney
